summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Deta model's functionality, covering configuration, initialization, forward computation, attention outputs, safetensors support, backbone freezing/unfreezing, object‑detection head integration, feed‑forward chunking, auxiliary loss handling, generation without explicit input IDs, token‑embedding resizing, gradient retention for hidden states and attentions, and weight‑tying rules.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of the Deta model across diverse scenarios, enabling reliable deployment and early detection of regressions in production pipelines.
